rawMarkdown: --- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/TVML/tv-placeholder crawled: 2025-12-01T22:45:07Z --- # tv-placeholder **Article** Sets a default image for an `img` or `monogram` element. ## Overview Here’s an example that displays the default movie image. ```xml Movie 1 ``` ### Values for tv-placeholder ### Elements that Use tv-placeholder - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/img] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/monogram] ## Styles - **Color Styles**: Provide the ability to customize an element’s color. - **Text Styles**: Change the text characteristics for an element. - **Element Shaping**: Modify the size and shape of an element. - **Element Alignment and Spacing**: Modify the alignment and spacing between elements. - **tv-rating-style**: Sets the displayed image for rating a product. - **tv-transition**: Specifies how an element transitions on and off the screen. - **tv-text-highlight-style**: Specifies how an element looks when it comes into focus. - **tv-scrollable-bounds-inset**: Creates an unscrollable region of a specified size at the top and bottom of the stack template.
